text:
[Verse]
Sunset in the sky
Colors start to fly
Night begins to sigh
Stars say hi hi hi

[Verse 2]
Walk along the shore
Feel the ocean roar
Magic in the air
With you I want more

[Chorus]
Sunset serenade
In your light I wade
Golden rays that fade
Memories we've made

[Bridge]
Hold your hand so tight
Moon begins its flight
Underneath the light
Everything feels right

[Verse 3]
Kiss beneath the palms
Wrapped up in your arms
Evening's gentle charms
Heartbeats loud as drums

[Chorus]
Sunset serenade
In your light I wade
Golden rays that fade
Memories we've made
title: Sunset Serenade
